arts.ttl: Duran strikes as Aston Villa edge past Southampton
arts.sum: Villa, who ended an eight-match winless streak across all competitions with victory over Brentford on Wednesday, broke through in the 24th minute through a wonderful individual goal by Duran. Jhon Duran scored the only goal as Aston Villa edged out the Premier League's bottom side Southampton 1-0 on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa fans are making the same point about John McGinn after win over Southampton
It’s madness – Russell Martin rues mistakes as Southampton lose at Aston Villa
arts.sum: Jhon Duran scored the only goal of the game.

arts.ttl: Unai Emery confirms fresh Aston Villa injury blow after Southampton win
arts.sum: Unai Emery has confirmed Leon Bailey suffered a hamstring injury in Aston Villa's 1-0 win over Southampton this afternoon. Philogene could get a run in the team now, or Emery may use McGinn off the left.

arts.ttl: Every word a happy Unai Emery said after Aston Villa beat Southampton
arts.sum: The supporters were here with us, helping us and trying to send the energy and I think today we played more or less getting better, getting confidence, understanding in our process how we can improve here and get points. The most important thing was how he worked today and then him scoring is better for the team.

arts.ttl: John Townley's Villa player ratings as trio impress in 1-0 win over Southampton
arts.sum: Jhon Duran opened the scoring in the first half before Villa managed to see out their seventh league win of the season and record their second clean sheet. After Southampton left-back Ryan Manning went close early on, former Villa forward Cameron Archer had a great chance to put the visitors in front, but Ezri Konsa made a terrific block to deny him.

arts.ttl: Saints lacking belief in front of goal - Martin
arts.sum: Southampton boss Russell Martin says his side lack belief in front of goal after another defeat leaves them eight points from safety having lost 12 of their 15 top-flight games.

arts.ttl: Jhon Duran earns Aston Villa victory over struggling Southampton
arts.sum: The forward capitalised on a defensive error from the visitors.

arts.ttl: Composed Duran finish helps Villa see off Saints
arts.sum: Highlights from the Premier League match between Aston Villa and Southampton.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa 1-0 Southampton: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Jhon Duran gives Unai Emery second Premier League win in a row
arts.sum: Sports Mole looks at the highlights, man of the match, and stats from Saturday's Premier League clash between Aston Villa and Southampton.
